name: Anjali
bio: Software developer and coding mentor with 5+ years of experience. Specializes in teaching Python and web development to beginners.

name: Ravi
bio: Mechanical engineer guiding rural students in practical design, CAD tools, and career readiness.

name: Fatima
bio: Entrepreneurial coach focused on helping young people start their own small-scale businesses and financial literacy.

name: Suresh
bio: Electrical engineer mentoring students in solar energy, wiring, and government skill programs.

name: Priya
bio: Digital marketing mentor helping students understand online branding, content creation, and social media strategy.

name: Megha
bio: School teacher mentoring young girls on education continuity, scholarships, and basic computer skills.

name: Rahul
bio: Guides students in government job preparation, focusing on reasoning, general awareness, and practice papers.

name: Rekha
bio: Healthcare mentor providing knowledge on nursing careers, first aid, and health worker roles in rural areas.

name: Deepak
bio: Mentors students on mobile repair training and digital service entrepreneurship for self-employment.
